Hello, I'm Graham.

Full-Stack Developer crafting fast, inclusive web products

Read more ›

What's my role as a developer?

As a full-stack web developer, I'm responsible for understanding the big picture of any project. I have experience working across every facet of modern web applications, from writing the structure of pages and styling components in the browser to designing APIs and managing databases on remote servers.

Not only do I ensure visually appealing interfaces, high-performance, and easy-to-read code, but I also build accessibility into everything I make.

Contact me to learn more about my process.
